articles.author: Jennifer Hansler, Kylie Atwood and Celine Alkhaldi, CNN
articles.title: US confirms it has sent response to EU on proposal to salvage the Iran nuclear deal - CNN
articles.description: The United States has sent its response to the European Union on a proposal to try to save the Iran nuclear deal, the US State Department confirmed Wednesday.
articles.content:
(CNN)The United States has sent its response to the European Union on a proposal to try to save the Iran nuclear deal, the US State Department confirmed Wednesday.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: US President Joe Biden announces nearly $US3 billion in new military aid for Ukraine - ABC News
articles.description: As the war in Ukraine drags on, US security assistance is shifting to a longer-term campaign that also will likely keep more American military troops in Europe into the future, US officials said.
articles.content: Six months after Russia's invasion of Ukraine, United States President Joe Biden announced that he is sending $US2.98 billion ($4.33 billion) in new military aid to Ukraine that will enable forces th… [+7094 chars]
